71f
A CERTIFICATE OF AND THE VALIDITY OF AN INTERNATIONAL WILL
(1) According to this Act, the certificate referred to in the preceding Article shall be sufficient proof of the formal validity of a document as a will, unless proved otherwise.
(2) The fact that the certificate is missing or is not drawn up correctly shall not affect the formal validity of a will drawn up following the provisions of Articles 71a to 71c of this Act.
